description: Try our easy to follow Orange Cornflake Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cookie,Orange,Seafood free,Egg free,Jan Feb 2020,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free,Stone fruit
name: Orange Cornflake Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line two trays with baking paper.
Combine carrot, apricots, orange zest, flour, oats, margarine, yoghurt, honey and nutmeg in a large bowl. Add crushed cornflakes and stir to combine.
Shape into rough balls, place on tray and bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Cool on trays.
